note: VO: 'They want credibility from the actual expert. As one customer put it...'
VO: 'They want transparency and unfiltered information. They want the truth about their car...'
VO: 'They want technical depth. They have questions the service advisor may not be able to answer...'
VO: 'They want to build trust through direct conversation. They need to feel confident in their decision...'
VO: 'And many want shared enthusiasm. They want to talk to someone who understands and appreciates Porsche...'
VO: 'They are not looking to negotiate price with you...'
VO: 'They are not trying to catch you in a lie or challenge your diagnosis...'
VO: 'They are not expecting you to resolve warranty disputes...'
VO: 'And they are not trying to waste your time. Most customers genuinely respect your expertise...'
VO: 'Here is the key insight you need to remember: Porsche owners are often enthusiasts...'
